Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Pie = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local throwAnim
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function sleep(hit, pumpkinClone) if hit and hit.Parent and pumpkinClone then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil and pumpkinClone then humanoid:TakeDamage(3) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 if pumpkinClone then pumpkinClone:Remove() end local character = humanoid.Parent
if game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) then local spamScript = script:FindFirstChild("SpamScript"):Clone() spamScript.Parent = character spamScript.Disabled = false end
wait(0.1) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end end
function shoot(direction, pumpkinClone) if myTorso and myHumanoid then local spawnPos = Pie.Position + direction * 4.0 pumpkinClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction)
pumpkinClone.Velocity = (direction + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)).unit * 45.0 pumpkinClone.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, pumpkinClone:GetMass() * 128.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = pumpkinClone
pumpkinClone.Parent = game.Workspace
pumpkinClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) sleep(hit, pumpkinClone) end)
debris:AddItem(pumpkinClone, 2.5) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local pumpkinClone = Pie:Clone() pumpkinClone.CanCollide = true
Pie.Transparency = 1.0
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Pie.Position).unit
shoot(direction, pumpkinClone)
wait(0.25) Pie.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
function onUnequipped() if throwAnim then throwAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Pie.Touched:connect(sleep)

local vCharacter = script.Parent
local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local playerGui local spamGui
local spamFrame
local piePatch
local imageAssets = {65951551, 65951575, 65951591}
tick()
if vPlayer then playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui then spamGui = playerGui:FindFirstChild("SpamGui") if spamGui == nil then spamGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") spamGui.Name = "SpamGui" spamGui.Parent = playerGui
spamFrame = Instance.new("Frame") spamFrame.Name = "SpamFrame" spamFrame.Parent = spamGui spamFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) spamFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) spamFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
piePatch = Instance.new("ImageLabel") piePatch.Size = UDim2.new(0, 256, 0, 256) piePatch.Position = UDim2.new(math.random() , 0, math.random(), 0) piePatch.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. imageAssets[math.random(1, #imageAssets)] piePatch.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 piePatch.Parent = spamFrame else spamFrame = spamGui:FindFirstChild("SpamFrame") piePatch = Instance.new("ImageLabel") piePatch.Size = UDim2.new(0, 256, 0, 256) piePatch.Position = UDim2.new(math.random() , 0, math.random(), 0) piePatch.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. imageAssets[math.random(1, #imageAssets)] piePatch.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 piePatch.Parent = spamFrame end end end
wait(4.0) if piePatch then piePatch:Remove() end script:Remove()

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
